thread.title: Shadow fleet insurance checks could backfire, says maritime lawyer
thread.title_full: Shadow fleet insurance checks could backfire, says maritime lawyer

title: Shadow fleet insurance checks could backfire, says maritime lawyer
text:
A group of Northern European countries risks missing the mark when they, as announced in a [joint statement](https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/media/67605b1a365803b3ac5b5b71/A_joint_statement_by_the_Nordic-Baltic_8++_countries_on_further_action_to_counter_Russia_s__shadow_fleet_..pdf), start checking whether tankers suspected of carrying sanctioned Russian oil are insured, according to lawyer Anders Amstrup Fournais, partner at the Hafnia Law Firm.
Shadow fleet insurance checks could backfire, says maritime lawyer
At worst, checking insurance documents when Russian shadow fleet tankers sail through European waters can in fact benefit Russia, according to a maritime lawyer.
[JENS THOMSEN](mailto:jt@shippingwatch.dk)
